name: Blue Goose Aviation, Inc.
about: Blue Goose Aviation, Inc., based at the Polson, MT airport (8S1), is a specialized flying school and tour operator led by a retired Air Force pilot with over 13,000 flight hours and a FAA Certified Flight Instructor since 1982. The school offers comprehensive flight training courses, including Private, Commercial, Instrument, and specialized Mountain Flying programs. In addition to training, Blue Goose Aviation organizes scenic tours around Flathead Lake and the Mission Valley, as well as group Air Tours to scenic destinations in the western United States, Alaska, and the Bahamas. These tours combine flight training with outdoor activities like fishing, whitewater rafting, and visits to national parks, making them a unique blend of education and vacation. With a focus on safety and fun, Blue Goose Aviation provides an unparalleled flying experience. Contact us to schedule your scenic or training flight and enjoy the beauty of mountain flying with expert guidance.
